Coordinates extracted from the document indicate the location of the Cullinan Diamond Mine in Gauteng Province, South Africa. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.mining-technology.com/projects/cullinan-diamond-mine-gauteng/. The Cullinan Mine is located in the Gauteng province of South Africa, approximately 40km east of Pretoria

web_search_companies.notes: Petra Diamonds is the primary operator and majority owner of the Cullinan Mine.
